resources.string: Zoom2u connects you with local drivers in your area for fast same day deliveries.
I Accept the customer terms and conditions.

What would you like to send today?
At zoom2u we know how important it is to know where your parcel is and when it will be delivered.
Send SMS Tracking Link to Pickup Person
(please provide a phone number above and provide notes regarding the location of the package)
This is a no-contact delivery (please provide authority to leave details below)
(please provide a phone number above and provide notes regarding the location of the package)
(Your parcel will be picked up and delivered within the requested window. it may not be at this exact time)
(Total weight cannot exceed 100kg, and each item cannot exceed 30kg. This is for the health and safety of our drivers. If you require extra large items moved, please use the Bid Requests feature!)

I Accept the customer terms and conditions.
Keep an eye on your smartphone or computer for three email/messages from. They are:
Tweet or share us on Facebook to earn a $5 credit towards your next delivery.
Why is my booking on hold ?
Thank you for your booking. We have it recorded in our system, but have placed it on hold as the credit card details that you entered failed the authorisation process.
This may be because the details you entered are incorrect, or authorisation for this purchase has been rejected by your bank.
Your package will not be picked up while the booking is on hold.
Please enter or add an alternative payment method below in order to make your booking active. We accept MasterCard, Visa and Amex.
If you have any queries, please email us at
Thanks for using Zoom2u for your interstate delivery
Thanks for using Zoom2u for your interstate road delivery

Please note your delivery will go on a Qantas flight. Once it arrives at the destination airport our couriers can collects the parcel 20 minutes after arrival. 

If the item is at the airport prior to 10am Qantas will deliver it to destination airport on the same day. If it’s after 10am there is still a good chance it will be delivered on the same day however it is not guaranteed. 

If your item is extremely important and needs to be delivered same day Qantas does offer a next flight service, this will cost an additional $95 on your delivery. This means that once your parcel arrives at the airport 1 hour form this time it can go on the next available flight to your destination. If you like this option please place the booking and call our office on 1300 966 628 or email deliveries@zoom2u.com 

Air freight can be delayed, airports can close and there is a lot that is outside of our control. We therefore unfortunately cannot guarantee this service, that being said 99% of our customers are very happy with this service.

Please note if this an urgent delivery it recommended that you use our air service as this service only operate during weekdays.This delivery service uses the Greyhound bus network to deliver parcels interstate. Our Zoom2u courier will pickup your parcel on arrival and deliver directly to you.
To help with delivery please make sure
Your parcel is marked for Zoom2u with the destination airport.
If it’s a small item place it in a larger box so it can’t be lost.
Make your parcel is packaged extremely well so it can’t be damaged.
Make sure the destination address is available after 5pm.

Any substance which, as presented for transport, is liable to explode, dangerously react, produce a flame or, dangerous emission of toxic, corrosive or flammable gases or vapours under conditions normally encountered in transport must not be sent interstate under any circumstance.The following is a non-comprehensive list of goods which cannot be accepted for interstate delivery: aerosols, hair tonic/hair sprays, batteries, explosives, corrosives, perfume, massage oils, pressurised or unpressurised cylinders and/or similar type containers, firearms and ammunition, radioactive material, paint fuel and/or fuel tanks etc.
Please enter a minimum password of 6 characters.
Enter your Email and we\'ll send you a link to reset your password.
Many seemingly harmless goods can be dangerous on board an aircraft.

I hereby declare that my shipment does not contain any of the above products, any item that would not be permitted in checked luggage on a passenger flight or any other dangerous good as outlined by IATA regulations.
Where possible, any old labelling has been removed to avoid any confusion or missorting during processing and shipping - This includes address, shipping and special handling labels.
I understand that, in the unlikely event my package is lost or damaged, Zoom2u can cover up to $300 in damages - This coverage will be void if my package is fragile or insufficiently packaged.
I understand that, in the unlikely event my package is lost or damaged, Zoom2u can cover up to $300 in damages - This coverage will be void if my package is fragile or insufficiently packaged.
I acknowledge this consignment may travel by air and make this statement for the purpose of section 23A of the Civil Aviation Act.

I understand that I am personally responsible for the above statements and that misdeclaring goods or knowingly or recklessly making false or misleading statement is a statutory offence punishable by imprisonment and/or a fine and may render me liable in damages - Including the return of my items at my expense.
My package does not contain batteries of any kind.
My package is not fragile, delicate, or can be easily damaged.
My parcel has been packaged well to avoid any light bumps caused during general handling. If the item is small it has been placed in a larger box to minimise any chance of it being lost in transit.
The appropriate label has been attached (Label for laptops and mobile phones can be downloaded here).
Item will be in original packaging.
Item will be packaged (Not in original packaging)
Item will not be packaged. (Please note: This option will void any damage cover for this delivery. Items sent without packaging are at the customers own risk.)
(Your parcel will be droped off and deliver within the requested window.it may not be at this exact time.)
All available couriers will be notified of your request, and will reply (usually within minutes) with individual pricing and time frames.
Your courier will then collect and deliver your items!
